Hi all,
Shot in the dark here, but worth a try.
A member has posted on my f=
orum. Many years ago, Hal K. used to
frequent the sword shows. Some may rem=
ember him.
10 or more years ago he sold a Heianjo tsuba (Large round solid =
plate
with mixed soft metal flowers) to a guy either at the Chicago or
Flor=
ida show. In cleaning up his stuff, he has come across the papers
for that =
tsuba, and would love to unite them with the owner now.
So if anyone thinks=
 they may have it, pop into
http://www.militaria.co.za/nmb/viewtopic.php?f=
=3D9&t=3D4551 for a pic and
see if you can get your origami 10 years later =
:-)

Brian
